meanings.definition: Wheyfaces: plural noun, a facial expression of disgust or contempt
meanings.sent1: When she saw the mess in the kitchen, her wheyfaces showed her disapproval.
meanings.sent2: The children's wheyfaces clearly displayed their disappointment at the canceled field trip.
meanings.sent3: Even the dog made wheyfaces when it smelled the spoiled food.
meanings.sent4: The wheyfaces of the audience made the comedian realize his jokes were not funny.
meanings.sent5: His wheyfaces were so exaggerated that everyone burst into laughter.

meanings.definition: Wheyfaces: verb, to make a face expressing disgust or contempt
meanings.sent1: She would wheyfaces whenever she had to eat broccoli.
meanings.sent2: The toddler started to wheyfaces when offered the medicine.
meanings.sent3: He would always wheyfaces when his sister teased him about his haircut.
meanings.sent4: The actor had to wheyfaces on cue during the play.
meanings.sent5: The student tried to wheyfaces discreetly during the boring lecture.
